column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ A Korean man wielding a batons and sword was seen walking around Borey Toul Sangke from 6 to 7:40 am
column4: forcing police to intervene.------The incident occurred on the concrete road in Borey Villa
column12: the man was holding the knife and baton and acting erratically. People contacted the authorities to come and see.------When the cops came in
column14: then the man walked into a nearby house.------The authorities asked for the passport of the man
column15: but it couldn’t be found. What happened next is not reported. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/413331
